info.title: Swagger spec for Work Market API v2/Employer API

get.summary: Get an assignment template for a given list of fields

put.summary: Update a custom field group's custom fields by position

get.summary: Get the deliverables associated with this assignment

post.summary: Update the deliverables associated with this assignment

put.summary: Update the deliverables associated with this assignment

get.summary: Get the documents associated with this assignment

post.summary: Create/update the documents associated with this assignment

put.summary: Create/update the documents associated with this assignment

post.description: All objects in the assignment graph will be affected

put.description: All objects in the assignment graph will be affected

get.summary: Get an assignment's custom field groups

post.summary: Update an assignment's custom field groups

put.summary: Update an assignment's custom field groups

post.summary: Accept work on behalf of the given worker

get.summary: Get client companies with the given fields
Get projects for the given client company
Get a list of client locations
Get a list of custom field groups and suppress all but the given fields

response.description: Result object, or list of objects

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of this response

timestamp.description: Request start time in seconds from epoch
